bodies.description:
- Items that can be exchanged with Trade Pts. will be updated
after a certain period of time, or can be updated immediately
by consuming a Dragon Stone.

- The items up for trade are selected randomly.

- Initially, only a few items are available for trade. 
Use Trade Pts. to unlock more item slots. 
The more item slots unlocked, the higher 
the chance for you to find the items you're after!

- There is a rare chance of finding precious items 
or discounts!

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= How to Earn Trade Pts. ={size}{color}{outline}

- Characters or items can be exchanged for Trade Pts.

-  The amount of Trade Pts. you get from exchanges 
depends on the characters or items you offer.
In addition, please be aware that {color: #FF3333}characters or items
cannot be retrieved once they are exchanged{color}.

- Please note that Baba won't accept all items.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Use Zeni to Trade ={size}{color}{outline}

- There are also items than can be purchased with Zeni 
at Baba's Shop.

- After you purchase a certain item with Zeni, it will be 
restocked after a certain period of time.

- The items that can be purchased with Zeni rarely change.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Use Treasure Items to Trade ={size}{color}{outline}

- There are also items that can be exchanged with 
Treasure Items at Baba's Shop.

- Treasure Items can be obtained from the maps of 
stages after Area 16, "Reunited", in "Quest"
or from certain events.

- Certain items that can be exchanged with 
Treasure Items are only available for a limited time.

- New Treasure Items can be added at any time.

- You can switch between different Treasures by swiping
left or right under the "Treasure" tab at Baba's Shop.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Tips on Baba's Shop ={size}{color}{outline}

- Baba's Shop is a place where you can
exchange things you don't need for Trade Pts.
then purchase things you do want with the points!

- If you happen to collect more Awakening Medals or items
than you need, exchange them for Trade Pts. at Baba's Shop.

- Try your luck at Baba's Shop if you miss your chance
to collect certain Awakening Medals in events.
They might appear in Baba's Shop for trade.
Keep an eye on the update timer for new stock!

- The more slots you unlock in Baba's Shop,
the higher the probability you will find the items you need!

{color: #FF3333}* Please note that the pricing in Zeni and Trade Pts. are
subject to change without prior warning.{color}

announcements.title:
Limited event 
Awakening power! Trials in new areas

must unlock all potential.
